alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 10:22PM EDT until March 28 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Minor flooding continues along the Green River at Paradise. The river has crested and is forecast to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 381.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Monday was 381.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 368.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
